title: 服务协议和隐私政策(Service Agreement and Privacy Policy)
message: 请你务必审慎阅读、充分理解《用户隐私保护协议》各条款了解详细信息。如果你同意，请点击下面按钮开始接受我们的服务。 Please be sure to read carefully and fully understand the 《User Privacy Protection Agreement》 for details. If you agree, please click the button below to start receiving our services.

second.title: 确认提示(Confirmation)
second.message: 进入应用前，你需先同意《用户隐私保护协议》，否则将退出应用。 Before entering the application, you need to agree to < a href = "https://www.booyood.com/privacypolicy.html"> < / a > 《user privacy protection agreement》 , otherwise will exit the application.
